name: Villain's Promise
description:
You've woken up 7 years before your execution, but that only makes you wonder... Is this a chance to right all your wrongs or is it punishment?

Customization:

  • Pronouns
  • hair length
  • hair color
  • skin color
  • height
  • sexuality

Depending on your sexuality, you will have six different romance options that adhere to your preference.

If you have a preference for men: 

  • Dionte
  • Caspian
  • Wen
  • Zenon
  • Kaeden
  • Lucian

If you have a preference for women:

  • Mae
  • Katherine
  • Rei
  • Zenona
  • Ashanti
  • Elaine

If you don't have a preference or if you're not attracted to anyone:

  • Void
  • Caspian
  • Rei
  • Zen
  • Kaeden
  • Elaine

(Currently being made with Harlowe, may eventually convert it to SugarCube for better quality)

Started: 06/20/21
